0.name: Through the Prickly Thicket
desc: "   The sky above the thicket begins to dim as you enter deeper into the prickly
vines.  The midnight thicket's vines have grown gigantic and are covered in
sharp thorns that stick directly into your boots.  Ouch!  The vines are dark
green in color, almost black, and are easily the size of large trees.  They
are so large that you could easily walk along them without falling off.
Shifting and pulsing beneath your feet, the dark green vines seem to have a
life of their own.  It is almost as though they are screaming in pain.  The
prickly thicket continues to the northeast, southeast, southwest, northwest
and down.

17.name: Through the Prickly Thicket
desc: "   The sky above the thicket begins to dim as you enter deeper into the prickly

18.name: Through the Prickly Thicket
desc: "   The gigantic vines of the midnight thicket have completely blocked out the
sky.  The lack of sunlight has led to complete darkness.  As if the darkness
was not confusing enough, the endless miles of these prickly vines have made
you lose your place.  It is difficult to tell where you are going or where
you have been.  Looking around the thicket, it is amazing what has occurred
here.  The midnight thicket's vines have grown to an enormous size and are
covered in sharp thorns that stick directly into your boots.  The vines are
dark green in color, almost black, and are easily the size of large trees.
Touching the vines with your hands, you can feel a pulsing and shivering
energy flowing through them.  It feels almost like they are alive!  The
prickly thicket continues to the northeast, southeast, southwest, northwest
and up.

desc: "   The gigantic vines of the midnight thicket have completely blocked out the

you lose your place.  It is difficult to tell where you are going or where
you have been.  Looking around the thicket, it is amazing what has occurred
here.  The midnight thicket's vines have grown to an enormous size and are
covered in sharp thorns that stick directly into your boots.  The vines are
dark green in color, almost black, and are easily the size of large trees.
Touching the vines with your hands, you can feel a pulsing and shivering
energy flowing through them.  It feels almost like they are alive!  The
prickly thicket continues to the northwest.

38.name: Through the Prickly Thicket
desc: "   It is getting difficult to see more than a few feet in front of you.  The
darkness in this level of the thicket seems to even suppress your light
source.  It has become impossible to tell exactly where you are.  Every
direction that you turn looks just like where you were.  Looking around at
the immediate surroundings, it is amazing what has occurred here.  The
midnight thicket's vines have grown to a gigantic size and are covered in
sharp thorns that stick directly into your boots.  Reaching down to touch
the vines beneath your feet, a pulsing rhythm beats underneath the plants
skin.  It feels like it could be alive!  The prickly thicket continues to
the southeast, southwest, northwest, north and up.

the north and south.

sharp thorns that stick directly into your boots.  Reaching down to touch
the vines beneath your feet, a pulsing rhythm beats underneath the plants
skin.  It feels like it could be alive!  The prickly thicket continues to
the south.

42.name: Through the Prickly Thicket
desc: "   It is getting difficult to see more than a few feet in front of you.  The
darkness in this level of the thicket seems to even suppress your light
source.  It has become impossible to tell exactly where you are.  Every
direction that you turn looks just like where you were.  Looking around at
the immediate surroundings, it is amazing what has occurred here.  The
midnight thicket's vines have grown to a gigantic size and are covered in
sharp thorns that stick directly into your boots.  Reaching down to touch
the vines beneath your feet, a pulsing rhythm beats underneath the plants
skin.  It feels like it could be alive!  The prickly thicket continues to
the southeast and northwest.

desc: "   It is getting difficult to see more than a few feet in front of you.  The
darkness in this level of the thicket seems to even suppress your light
source.  It has become impossible to tell exactly where you are.  Every
direction that you turn looks just like where you were.  Looking around at
the immediate surroundings, it is amazing what has occurred here.  The
midnight thicket's vines have grown to a gigantic size and are covered in
sharp thorns that stick directly into your boots.  Reaching down to touch
the vines beneath your feet, a pulsing rhythm beats underneath the plants
skin.  It feels like it could be alive!  The prickly thicket continues to
the southwest and northwest.

63.name: Through the Prickly Thicket
desc: "   It is getting difficult to see more than a few feet in front of you.  The
darkness in this level of the thicket seems to even suppress your light
source.  It has become impossible to tell exactly where you are.  Every
direction that you turn looks just like where you were.  Looking around at
the immediate surroundings, it is amazing what has occurred here.  The
midnight thicket's vines have grown to a gigantic size and are covered in
sharp thorns that stick directly into your boots.  Reaching down to touch
the vines beneath your feet, a pulsing rhythm beats underneath the plants
skin.  It feels like it could be alive!  The prickly thicket continues to
the northeast and southeast.

64.name: Before a Hole in the Ground
desc: "   The midnight thicket comes to an abrupt halt before a large hole in the
ground.  It looks like something has dug a gigantic cavern directly into the
ground here.  The cavern is pitch-black and it is impossible to see very
far inside.  The vines of the midnight thicket are starting to go crazy.
They are pulling themselves from the ground and lashing you violently.  You
better gown down into the cave to back into the prickly thicket to the
northwest.

65.name: A Rocky Cavern
desc: "   The cavern looks as though it has been freshly dug out.  There are claw and
teeth marks all over the cavern walls.  You do not see any stalagmites or
stalactites, so it is obvious this place has not been here for long.  The
pure darkness of the tunnel is almost suffocating.  You hurry along the cavern
with your hands in front of you, hoping not to bump into anything.  The sheer
panic of the dark is starting to get to you.  It might be best to go back up
into the midnight thicket.  The cavern walls suggest that the tunnel continues
to the south.

66.name: A Rocky Cavern
desc: "   The cavern looks as though it has been freshly dug out.  There are claw and
teeth marks all over the cavern walls.  The walls are almost smooth to the
touch, except for the random claw and teeth imprints.  The pure darkness of
the tunnel is almost suffocating.  You hurry along the cavern with your hands
brushing against the cavern wall, hoping not to bump into anything.  The
sheer panic of the dark is starting to push you over the edge.  Your only
urge is to run back into the midnight thicket at the end of the cavern to
the north.  The cavern walls suggest that the tunnel continues to the north
and south.

67.name: A Rocky Cavern
desc: "   The cavern looks as though it has been freshly dug out.  There are claw and
teeth marks all over the cavern walls.  The walls are almost smooth to the
touch, except for the random claw and teeth imprints.  The pure darkness of
the tunnel is starting to suffocate you.  The hurry along the cavern with
your hands brushing against the cavern wall, hoping not to bump into
anything.  Suddenly, your foot slips down, it looks like you may be able to
climb down deeper into the cavern.  The sheer panic of the darkness and
the unknown is starting to push you over the edge.  Your only instinct is
to run back into the midnight thicket at the end of the cavern to the
far north.  Run!

68.name: A Long and Dark Cavern
desc: "   The cavern looks as though it has been freshly dug out.  There are claw
and teeth marks all over the cavern walls.  The walls are almost smooth to
the touch, except for the random claw and teeth imprints.  You can see a
dull red glow pulsing through the hallways in the distance to the southwest.
The sounds of laughter and joy can also be heard, faintly bouncing off the
walls from the southwest.  Something must be happening down there.  It
might be worth checking out.

69.name: A Long and Dark Cavern
desc: "   The cavern looks as though it has been freshly dug out.  There are claw
and teeth marks all over the cavern walls.  The walls are almost smooth
to the touch, except for the random claw and teeth imprints.  A pulsing
dull red glow can be seen towards the end of the cavern in the distance
to the southwest.  There also seems to be some kind of meeting in that
direction.  The sounds of voices laughing and singing bounce off the
walls from that direction.  There must be something happening over there.

70.name: A Long and Dark Cavern
desc: "   The cavern looks as though it has been freshly dug out.  There are claw
and teeth marks all over the cavern walls.  The walls are almost smooth
to the touch, except for the random claw and teeth imprints.  A gigantic
cavern opens up to the southwest.  A pulsing, dull red glow illuminates
the cavern enough for you to tell that someone or several people in
doing something in there.  The shadows of the people are casts upon the
cavern walls all around you.  They must be standing directly in front
of whatever is emanating the light.

71.name: A Hollowed-Out Cavern
desc: "   The cavern looks as though it has been freshly dug out.  There are claw
and teeth marks all over the cavern walls.  The walls are almost smooth
to the touch, except for the random claw and teeth imprints.  This cavern
is humongous!  It could easily hold hundreds of people.  A gigantic skeletal
throne sits in the middle of the cavern, directly to the southwest.  A
dark tunnel lines to the northeast and the hollowed-out cavern continues to
the west and south.

72.name: A Hollowed-Out Cavern
desc: "   The cavern looks as though it has been freshly dug out.  There are claw
and teeth marks all over the cavern walls.  The walls are almost smooth to
the touch, except for the random claw and teeth imprints.  This cavern is
humongous!  It could easily hold hundreds of people.  A gigantic skeletal
throne sits in the middle of the cavern to the south.  The hollowed-out
cavern continues to the east and south.

73.name: A Hollowed-Out Cavern
desc: "   This cavern is humongous!  This must have taken someone years to dig out
of the ground.  The cavern could easily hold hundreds of people.  A gigantic
skeletal throne sits directly to the west.  The hollowed-out cavern continues
in every direction.

74.name: A Hollowed-Out Cavern
desc: "   A gigantic skeletal throne has grown straight out of the ground in this
part of the cavern.  Whole and partial skeletal remains make up the macabre
homage to whomever takes their seat upon it.  The throne seat is at least
twenty feet off the ground and looks out over all of the cavern.  It is
clear that whomever sits upon it wants its followed to look up at it.
How vain!  Looking around, it is hard to believe how large this cavern
actually is.  This must have taken forever to build!  The hollowed-out
cavern continues in every direction.

75.name: A Hollowed-Out Cavern
desc: "   The cavern looks as though it has been freshly dug out.  There are claw
and teeth marks all over the cavern walls.  The walls are almost smooth to
the touch, except for the random claw and teeth imprints.  This cavern is
humongous!  It could easily hold hundreds of people.  A gigantic skeletal
throne sits directly to the east.

76.name: A Hollowed-Out Cavern
desc: "   The cavern looks as though it has been freshly dug out.  There are claw
and teeth marks all over the cavern walls.  The walls are almost smooth to
the touch, except for the random claw and teeth imprints.  This cavern is
humongous!  It could easily hold hundreds of people.  A gigantic skeletal
throne sits in the middle of the cavern in the distance to the west.  The
hollowed-out cavern continues to the west.

77.name: A Hollowed-Out Cavern
desc: "   The cavern looks as though it has been freshly dug out.  There are claw
and teeth marks all over the cavern walls.  The walls are almost smooth to
the touch, except for the random claw and teeth imprints.  This cavern is
humongous!  It could easily hold hundreds of people.  A gigantic skeletal
throne sits in the middle of the cavern to the northwest.  The hollowed-out
cavern continues to the north and west.

78.name: A Hollowed-Out Cavern
desc: "   The cavern looks as though it has been freshly dug out.  There are claw
and teeth marks all over the cavern walls.  The walls are almost smooth to
the touch, except for the random claw and teeth imprints.  This cavern is
humongous!  It could easily hold hundreds of people.  A gigantic skeletal
throne sits in the middle of the cavern to the north.  The hollowed-out
cavern continues to the north and east.
